first_para: Michael Douglas Thornton (born 1 May 1952) is a British politician and the Liberal Democrat Member of Parliament for Eastleigh in Hampshire. He was elected in the Eastleigh by-election held on 28 February 2013.

full.extract: Michael Douglas Thornton (born 1 May 1952) is a British politician and the Liberal Democrat Member of Parliament for Eastleigh in Hampshire. He was elected in the Eastleigh by-election held on 28 February 2013.
full.title: Mike Thornton (politician)
